resources.string: "Swipe" for directional movement (hold for virtual joystick). "Tap" to confirm selection in menu or Pause one turn in-game (hold to Pause several turns in-game). "Double tap" to cancel or go back in menus (works like Escape key). "Pinch" to zoom in/out (in-game). Use hardware "Back" button to toggle virtual keyboard (hold to toggle keyboard shortcuts).
